login.title: SSPanel Login
login.description: Please sign in to your SSPanel account. The panel URL is fetched from Git URL API and decoded from Base64 automatically.
login.panelUrlHint: Panel URL source: Git URL API (Base64 decoded). An accessible domain is selected automatically and cached for 24 hours.

error.required: Please fill in all login fields.
error.resolvePanelUrlFailed: Failed to resolve panel URL. Please check Git URL API or network and try again.
error.unknown: Login failed, please try again later.
